Game.Overview: The world of Invizimals The Resistance features a pulse-pounding storyline that immerses players in an epic adventure. There are 150 creatures waiting to be captured, including 90 beloved classics from PSP, and even more ways to capture them with 20 brand new mini-games designed by Novarama. The Resistance also feature new and exciting battle game modes, 'Survivor' and 'Free For All'.
